item.title: An Introduction to R: Data Cleaning, Wrangling, and Visualizing
item.description: class: middle Introduction I’m a fourth year grad student at UCSB Began chipping away at learning R about four years ago It was really frustrating After a major project or two, it became my preferred tool for most things data analysis I don’t expect you to be experts after this session, but I hope you know where to start! class: center, middle ### What are you hoping to get out of thise course?
